brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts an activity in which you must identify the flow pattern for each type of traffic. If the traffic has more than one flow pattern, select the pattern with highest coverage.

The flow patterns choices are LAN, WAN, or External.

Traffic type

One.Company Email.
Two.File Sharing.
Three.Off-site Data Backup and Recovery.
Four.Internal Backup and Restore Operations.
Five.System Update.
Six.Printing.
Seven.On-line Transaction Processing.
Eight.Internet Traffic.
Nine.VPN.
Ten.Intra-campus Voice.
